long_description: A construction worker working on a housing development.
narration: A Construction Worker is surveying the area.
dialogs: You approach the Construction Worker. He says: 'I got a bit of a thinker for you. Want to solve it?'
You want another try at my puzzle?
Yeah, I don't think that's it.
Nice job. Sorry, I don't have anything to offer you but at least you had fun, eh?
Sorry, can't chat. I have to finish this before the boss gets on my case.
